PersonalStatement.text: Sue Thomas, born on 1972-09-27, is a Male based in Maryfurt, Reunion. He is Divorced and holds British nationality. Currently working at Morgan-Ellis.

WorkExperience.text: Software Developer at Dunlap PLC from 2015 to 2018.
Senior Software Developer at Morgan-Ellis, 2019 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: PhD in Computer Science from University of Bath
Master's in Engineering from Universidade da Coruña

PersonalSkills.text: Technical Proficiency: Expert in cloud computing and distributed systems.
Communication: Strong ability to present technical information to non-technical stakeholders.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, he enjoys coding personal projects.
